alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 1:43PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Teton County through 230 PM MDT... At 143 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Driggs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Grand Teton and Phelps Lake around 200 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Leigh Lake, Moran Bay, Colter Bay Village and Moran Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
